Title: Bakugan: Geogan Rising
Description: [Bakugan: Geogan Rising, ' is the third season of the animated television series ', Bakugan: Battle Planet., ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', The anime aired from January 24, 2021 to September 12, 2021 in Canada on Teletoon. Regular streaming began on April 2, 2021 in Japan and ended on March 18, 2022. The episodes were released on 9Now, and Australian VOD.]
